author: Special Correspondent
text:
An election flying squad on Wednesday seized Rs. 59,000 during a vehicle check at Sivakasi junction in Sattur.

Police sources said that during the vehicle check, the squad intercepted a car and found the money inside it. Esakkiappan of Valliyoor, who was in the car, could not give any proper account for the cash.

He claimed that he was an agent in garments business and had collected the money from his customers.
title: Money seized from textile agent
